title: ►(7 HOURS) Music Mix #1 for Gaming►Dubstep/Electro/Glitch Hop/Drumstep/House (Monstercat Music)
description: Over 7 hours of the best Dubstep/Electro/Glitch Hop/Drumstep/House music to intensify your gameplay! See the bottom of the description for a list of all the songs and the times they occur in the playlist. Most of these songs came from Monstercat Media. If you enjoy these songs and want to be up-to-date when more are released, see Monstercat Media's pages below. If you want to support your favorite artists, then visit Monstercat Media's youtube page and search for your favorite artists. Sorry, but I cannot fit every artists' names on here; the description would be too long. Monstercat Media will have the links to your favorite artists' soundcloud, facebook, twitter, youtube, etc. for each of the songs: ▼ Follow Monstercat: Facebook: http://facebook.com/Monstercat Twitter: http://twitter.com/Monstercat Soundcloud: http://soundcloud.com/Monstercat Youtube: http://youtube.com/user/MonstercatMedia Do you guys want this mix on repeat (for those who have asked)? Then click the link below to go to a playlist of two videos: one of them is this 7 hour mix, and the other is the extra 1 hour mix. In the playlist, you have to option to set the videos on repeat, for a total of 8 HOURS of music to intensify your gameplay! ► https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e98gf... Here is a list of all the songs and the times they occur in the playlist. I was unable to fit the genre and artist on here because the description would be too long.
